Writer: Robert King (story), Robert King (screenplay), Terry Hayes (screenplay)
Title: Vertical Limit
Actors: Chris O'Donnell, Robin Tunney, Stuart Wilson, Augie Davis
Plot: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
